title: The Peasants are now Recruiting! LFM Platinum +
body:
Hello everyone,
It is I, the famous TKNS Penguin. I am a former member of The Knights which is currently under disbandment. I have carried many competitive teams such as the Knights to victory, and am looking to create a team of my own. That's right, the team will be called The Peasants and I am looking for Platinum + players to join the team, hopefully we can compete in some online tournaments and have a shot at the League of Legends Open Ladder. We will also be playing some Dynamic Ranked to improve our teamwork and communication skills :)

I am looking for friendly players who are interested in exchanging high levels of banter and pulling off great plays as a team which is what I believe is the best way to become a good team. If this is what you envisioned within a team, now is your chance to sign up.

Our current roster is as follows:
Top: TKNS Penguin
Jungle: -
Mid: -
ADC: -
Support: -

Substitutes:
Sub 1: -
Sub 2: -

Team Janitor/Cleaner: RHIN0
Team Janitor/Cleaner 2: TKNS Dom1nAtAr
Team Mascot: TKNS Diamond
Team Farmer: Stigjamm & TKNS Diamond
Team Coach: TKNS Diamond

If you are interested in signing up for The Peasants, feel free to leave a comment below or add me through the League of Legends Client. Thank you!

replies.body:
Hey Penguin.

I am your biggest fan. When you filled in for Dyrus during the group stages of worlds, wow. I was extremely impressed. It's great to see that you're starting a team up and you're back in OCE!

I'd apply for the team, but I'm afraid of looking sub-par in comparison to you, it disgusts me how lowly I am when I watch you play.

I would like nothing more than your manhood drizzled down my cheek and rubbed into my hairy chest. Please oblige, always yours.

Love, ClouDy.

Dear TKNS Penguin

Mid lane main, please add ATG Demonslayer. I would like to try out for your mid lane position. 

Past experiences;
-helped a plat 5 team reach plat 1 ( as in was apart of the team which ranked up to that league. I was a subbing because their mid was away.)
-I captained my own team to Gold 3
-Happy to be a team player and just listen to whatever needs to be done.
-Can practice anytime after monday. Even on monday's i am available 9pm onwards.

Reasons for why I have commented;
-I want to be apart of a competitive team which will help me grow.
-Make new mates
-If worse case situation happens and things don't work out or i don't make it. At least your opinion on how I should improve is very important to me.

I have added you so I look forward to speaking to you.

Cheers :)
Hey, very keen. Support main mostly. Currently sitting at P5.
Adc/mid main, very interested in filling a role as a substitution :) Will add you in the morning to discuss if you wish.
Support/Jungle main, keen to join a team that pulls together. Added you in-client.
